content:

inventory=[{"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "brick_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 13}, {"type": "diorite_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 14}, {"type": "gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 58, "index": 20}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 13, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 44, "index": 22}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 55, "index": 23}, {"type": "command_block_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "blue_concrete", "quantity": 64, "index": 27}, {"type": "crying_obsidian", "quantity": 41, "index": 29}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 23, "index": 30}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "chorus_flower", "quantity": 39, "index": 36}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 26, "index": 38}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 31, "index": 41}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}, {"type": "repeating_command_block", "quantity": 48, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft acacia_slab, I first need to craft acacia_planks. To do so, I need to place an acacia_wood in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the acacia_wood from slot 12 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now I have crafted the acacia_planks. I will move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11), so that I can use them to craft the acacia_slabs.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
